nodes.text: The MCT Nuurglat was a starship that was used by the Metatheran Cartel during the waning years of the Galactic Republic. During the Confederation Rock Rush in c. 31 BBY, the Nuurglat traveled into the Cularin system asteroid belt carrying a crew of five Caarites that were led by the Cartel executive Niim Stroolg, and they landed it in a cavern inside an asteroid. However, their arrival awoke a shadow creature that lay dormant within the asteroid, and it wrecked the Nuurglat and drove the Caarites to kill themselves.
